title: Ukraine's ports to reopen under deal to be signed Friday, Turkey says
content:
1. Ukraine's ports to reopen under deal to be signed Friday, Turkey says  Reuters
  2. Ukraine News: Turkey Says a Deal Has Been Reached to Unblock Ukrainian Grain Exports  The New York Times
  3. Food crisis: Ukraine grain export deal reached with Russia, says Turkey  BBC
  4. Turkey says a deal is close to allow grain exports from Ukrainian ports blocked by Russia  CNN
  5. U.S. says it will hold Russia accountable for carrying out Ukraine grain deal  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Turkey says a deal is close to allow grain exports from Ukrainian ports blocked by Russia  CNN

localize.title: ウクライナの港湾は、金曜日に署名される協定に基づいて再開されるとトルコは述べている。
土耳其表示，根据周五签署的协议，乌克兰的港口将重新开放
土耳其表示，根據週五簽署的協議，烏克蘭的港口將重新開放
